pageProps.title: Getting Started with Node.js and AWS: A Beginner's Guide
pageProps.metaDesc: Node.js is a popular JavaScript runtime environment that enables developers to create server-side applications. It is fast, efficient, and easy to learn, making it a popular choice among developers. Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a cloud computing platform that provides a wide range of services that can be used to build and deploy applications. In this beginner's guide, we'll explore how to get started with Node.js and AWS.
